title: Cant see enemies ranking why?
body:
Because they may get focused?

Gonna camp the higher rated player or is it because we'd camp the bronzy instead?

People just look on Lolking anyway so please return it. I mean people even check ur runes and masteries and there's nothing you can do about it, so there's literally no point hiding enemy rankings.

replies.body:
Yeah. I didn't see the point in that.

"The unseen border, is the deadliest."
i OP.GG my own team in champion select and use carry.gg in game for ranked so yeah have to agree with this.
